result.pre: mutations in IFITM3 modulate post-translational regulation and toggle antiviral specificity.
Mason-Pfizer monkey virus (MPMV) accesses a cellular mRNA export pathway.
Translational repression precedes and is required for ZAP-mediated mRNA decay.
